title: Families on the Move: Migration, Immigration, Emigration and Mobility. Edited by B. H. Settles, D. E. HanksIII and M. B. Sussman. (Pp. 416; $49.95.) Haworth Press: New York. 1993. Also published as Marriage and Family Review vol. 19 1/2 and vol. 19 3/4.
abstract: Families on the Move: Migration, Immigration, Emigration and Mobility. Edited by B. H. Settles, D. E. HanksIII and M. B. Sussman. (Pp. 416; $49.95.) Haworth Press: New York. 1993. Also published as Marriage and Family Review vol. 19 1/2 and vol. 19 3/4. - Volume 25 Issue 4
